name: Sweet Rage
description:
Sweet Rage is a creative tower defence game. 

Towers are built with modular pieces with different effects. After each wave you will receive new pieces and you will be able to rearrange the previously built towers.  

  • Build modular towers
  • Move towers and Change your strategy during weaves.
  • 8 unique modules to play with
  • Destroy the candies

Candies are trying to escape from the sweet world, this can’t happen not even one should escape!
